required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Zanubrutinib Plus R-CHOP for Patients With Newly Diagnosed Untreated Non-GCB DLBCL
clinical_study.official_title: Zanubrutinib Combination With R-CHOP in Treating Patients With Newly Diagnosed Untreated Non-GCB DLBCL

lead_sponsor.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University

clinical_study.source: The First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University

brief_summary.textblock: Aim of this study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of zanubrutinib in combination with R-CHOP for newly diagnosed untreated Non-GCB DLBCL Patients

detailed_description.textblock: Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) is the most common type of non-Hodgkin's lymphoma. According to Hans' algorithms, DLBCL can be identified as 2 subtypes: germinal b-cell-like(GCB) and non-germinal b-cell-like(non-GCB). Approximately 50 to 60% of DLBCL was non-GCB subtype DLBCL.The non-GCB DLBCL revealed poor clinical outcomes. Bruton's tyrosine kinase (BTK) inhibitors have established therapeutic activity in B cell malignancies, with potential activity in non-GCB DLBCL. This study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of zanubrutinib in combination with R-CHOP for newly diagnosed untreated Non-GCB DLBCL Patients.

primary_outcome.description: To measure the duration of response to ZR-CHOP over a follow-up period of 18 months

secondary_outcome.description: To measure the duration of response to ZR-CHOP over a follow-up period of 18 months
Number of patients who achieved complete response after treatment by ZR-CHOP
Duration of overall response will be assessed from the first ZR-CHOP given to progression,death or last follow-up.
OS will be assessed from the first ZR-CHOP given to death or last follow-up.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured from start of treatment until 28 days after last dose
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with adverse events. Frequencies of toxicities based on the NCI Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE), version 5.0 will be tabulated

arm_group.description: Zanubrutinib plus Rituximab, Cyclosphosphamide, Doxorubicin, Vincristine and Prednisone (R-CHOP)

intervention.description: Vincristine-1.4 mg/m2 i.v d1 (/21d)(2 mg max)

overall_official.affiliation: The First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital of Soochow University

clinical_study.keyword: Zanubrutinib, R-CHOP, Newly diagnosed Non-GCB DLBCL
